Uses of Class
main.Crew

  • Packages that use Crew 
    Package Description
    main  

    • Uses of Crew in main

      Methods in main with parameters of type Crew 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String Actions.alienPirates​(Crew ship)
      This is called from the end day method with a 10% chance of occurring.
      java.lang.String Actions.asteroidBelt​(Crew ship)
      Random chance to occur when piloting the ship bewtween planets.
      java.lang.String ShopScreen.buyItem​(Crew theCrew, Item buyingItem)
      Given a Crew and an item to buy this method first ensure you have the required funds, then checks if you have a trader for discount.
      java.lang.String Actions.eat​(CrewMember member, Crew ship, FoodItem meal)
      The given crew member will eat the given food changing his status depending on what is eaten.
      java.lang.String Actions.endDay​(Crew ship)
      Reduces the day counter by one, calls updateScore.
      java.lang.String Actions.flyShip​(Crew ship, CrewMember firstCrew, CrewMember secondCrew)
      Takes two crew members and flys ship.
      java.lang.String Actions.infectSpacePlague​(Crew ship)
      Has a 10% chance to be called from end day method.
      static void CharacterCreationScreen.main​(Crew theCrew)
      Launch the application.
      static void ConsumeItemScreen.main​(Crew theCrew, int crewIndex, java.lang.String type)
      Launch the application.
      static void CrewMemberCommandScreen.main​(Crew theCrew, int crewIndex)
      Launch the application.
      static void MainScreen.main​(Crew theCrew)
      Launch the application.
      static void MovePlanetScreen.main​(Crew theCrew)
      Launch the application.
      static void ShopScreen.main​(Crew theCrew)
      Launch the application.
      java.lang.String Actions.medicate​(CrewMember crewMember, Crew ship, MedicalItem useMedicine)
      The given crew member will use the given medications healing him based on the healing value of the medicine.
      java.lang.String Actions.repairShip​(CrewMember crewMember, Crew ship)
      The given crew member is told to repair the given ship.
      java.lang.String Actions.searchPlanet​(CrewMember member, Crew ship, java.util.ArrayList<Planet> planets)
      The crew member will search the current planet indicated in the crew variable planet index Has 20% chance to find one of the following: Random food item, Random Medical item, a ship part, random amount of money or nothing.
      java.lang.String Actions.spacePlagueSymptom​(Crew ship)
      The symptoms of the space plague are performed here.
      void Actions.updateScore​(Crew ship)
      Updates the score based on the hunger, tiredness and health values of each of the crew members
